title: Example eval suite
description: Create a comprehensive example evaluation suite that demonstrates all SDK features. This serves as both documentation and a template for users to build their own eval suites.
acceptance_criteria: Complete example eval suite in examples/ directory
Demonstrates defineTest, defineSuite, and run APIs
Shows all built-in scorers (exactMatch, contains, llmJudge, toolSelectionScorer)
Demonstrates parallel execution and timeout configuration
Example can be run with npx neon eval
README in examples directory explaining how to run
implementation_notes: Create a realistic agent evaluation scenario (e.g., customer service agent, coding assistant)
Include both passing and failing test cases for demonstration
Show how to mock agent responses for testing
Provide both JavaScript and TypeScript examples
